actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the disability compensation paid to a veteran with a service-connected disability rated 30 per centum or more but less than total shall be increased by 10 percent when the veteran attains age 65.

summary.text: Provides that war veterans who attain the age of 65 and have a service-connected disability rated 30 percent or more but less than total shall have their wartime disability compensation increased by ten percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the disability compensation paid to a veteran with a service-connected disability rated 30 per centum or more but less than total shall be increased by 10 percent when the veteran attains age 65.
